parameters: An ambush is a bad name.
I already know of your purpose.
hit a dead end, and came seeking knowledge.
Oi, you already knew all that?
Don't underestimate a Magician, Little Devil Fiede.
For the time being... you are
welcoming us into your abode, yes?
I don't know about the ones downstairs,
but I welcome you with open arms.
Why should I be angry, hm?
I mean, we kinda just barged in...
and you don't have any plans to harm me.
It's a magician's way of thinking.
I have no intention of disturbing you.
There is no need to hide, Muracca.
Shall we check this place out?
Should we look for books about Dark attributes?
\C[17]The Missing Hunt\C[0]'s details have been updated.
Don't try to peek at a book someone else's reading.
I won't disturb you, so I wish
you wouldn't subject me to the same.
She answered before you even finished.
I said you could look around, but
I never said I'd listen to you.
But asking you is also a part of
But I couldn't find anything related to
Well, not that I'd answer necessarily.
So what, it's just for pleasantries!
In other words, are you trying to obtain
information with the reward of friendship?
Offering an exchange condition is not bad.
A healthy male... not bad looking, at that.
As you know, males are precious.
I really want to keep you around.
Uh, hey... There's no way you'd accept
but if she'd listen to us, then──
C'mere, we'll talk this out back.
Anyway, I'm not letting you take him,
Mostly for you, as you gained no information.
Whatever, we don't need you anyway.
Wasn't she in front of the bookshelves?
She'd reply if she was here, dammit.
Maybe she got tired of this farce.
Funny coming from you of all people.
No, it seems she warped back here
Um...\! To see how my friends are doing.
I may not be able to hunt enough for a while.
If we don't do something about the
disappearances, it'd be for naught, huh.
I tried asking the magician, but doesn't
as long as my conditions are met.
Then we'll just have to force it out of her.
How savage, deserving of a hunter.
What you know, tell me everything.
it's not like she's our opposition,
I don't understand the bonds you have, but
I can sense your emotions within.
If so, I won't hesitate then.
I have no intention of fighting you.
Because I can't win, after all.
Will you finally listen to us for once?
That seems to be the only way out.
Unfortunate, but I am in no power to resist.
Well then, what'd you like to ask?
the Dark traces in the snow fields?
I also did my own research.
What do you mean by that?
What did you understand from your research?
Be more precise with your questions, please.
Of course I meant that, dammit!
I don't know what it is, to be honest.
However, there is no doubt that there was a
very strong influence of the Dark attribute.
What do you think is a very powerful
Just a guess, but── lunacy, or perhaps
its origin. Or someone who manipulates it.
Isn't that just an influence of darkness?
This one just said the exact opposite.
I've become rather fond of it.
Ah, you've gotten a name, hm.
Then I shall call you as such.
...They don't seem to not get along that badly.
They just don't get along well, that's it.
Let me continue. Darkness brings lunacy,
Indeed. It's not just Dark, but
all attributes and their effects are
closely tied in ways one couldn't imagine.
is there some lunatic roaming in the snow?
Not impossible, but a naive thought.
The hunters would've discovered them already.
The one propagating the lunacy would be...
We fought the hunters who fell to lunacy.
The darkness is from their beings.
Yes, and now that darkness has gone to
bring other hunters down with it...
And those who have fallen into lunacy anew
However, this is only a hypothesis.
But what brought about this darkness
Mm, that I do not know.
The story just now was just a hypothetical
explanation of why traces of darkness
After all, you said you don't know,
but your face doesn't say that at all.
You must know of something, at least.
Even though only one eye is exposed,
you managed to guess my expression──
──well, I don't have a direction in mind,
Just who could be the source of the darkness?
What do you mean by that?
Something Muracca is hiding, to be exact──
Remember how she said she was checking up
But it doesn't have anything to do with this.
Then perhaps you could tell me what
The word refers to a special structure...
well, you don't need to know all that.
I will wait at Lavigny's entrance.
But we don't know where the entrance is.
Hunter's Rest, just a slight detour.
Or rather, I'll become your companion, too.
I'm getting tired of being here.
Besides, I haven't given up on my plan
to have you be my sex slave.
\C[17]Muracca's Secret\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
Now you're just hanging off us.
「In this world are floating islands named stars.
They float within a vast darkness.」
「The dark space is sometimes called The Sea.
Normally, there is no way to cross The Sea.
To do so, you must use the Reason of Wings.」
「The Reason of Wings isn't usable by all.
Certain conditions must be met to utilize it.
(I can also use it, reason unknown.)」
It has information about the darkness,
「In this world are floating islands named stars.
They float within a vast darkness.」
「The dark space is sometimes called The Sea.
Normally, there is no way to cross The Sea.
To do so, you must use the Reason of Wings.」
「The Reason of Wings isn't usable by all.
Certain conditions must be met to utilize it.
(I can also use it, reason unknown.)」
「This world has many stars, and some are more
important than others. These are Major Stars.」
「Each Major Star has a bias in attributes.
For example, Talvirar has an excess of Ice.
It can even be said to be the Major Star of Ice.」
「The first Major Star was said to be of Wind.
And after that, the Major Star of Darkness.」
...I think I heard of the Major Stars
from Miss Tahati. I believe there are six?
Likely. It can be said that each Major Star
is resided over by a Lord of Reason.
but it's wholly irrelevant to this case.
「This world has many stars, and some are more
important than others. These are Major Stars.」
「Each Major Star has a bias in attributes.
For example, Talvirar has an excess of Ice.
It can even be said to be the Major Star of Ice.」
「The first Major Star was said to be of Wind.
And after that, the Major Star of Darkness.」
Hm. Nothing here has what I need, I feel.
They have knowledge about much larger
Wouldn't it be easier to just ask the
magician directly instead of reading books?
If you want to rest, I don't mind.

events.name: 会話イベント（魔物参加）
